gears.sidescroller.world.levels

Class LevelGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gears.sidescroller.world.levels.LevelGenerator

  • public class LevelGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The LevelGenerator class is used to create random Levels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LevelGenerator()
      Creates a new LevelGenerator with its own built-in AreaGenerator.
      LevelGenerator(AreaGenerator areaGenerator) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Level generateRandom(int levelSize)
      Generates a new Level, producing Areas for it using this LevelGenerator's AreaGenerator.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelGenerator

        public LevelGenerator(AreaGenerator areaGenerator)
        Parameters:
        areaGenerator - the AreaGenerator which will generate random Areas for the Levels this creates.

      • LevelGenerator

        public LevelGenerator()
        Creates a new LevelGenerator with its own built-in AreaGenerator.

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandom

        public final Level generateRandom(int levelSize)
        Generates a new Level, producing Areas for it using this LevelGenerator's AreaGenerator.
        Parameters:
        levelSize - the width and height of the Levels this will generate, measured in Areas.
        Returns:
        the newly generated Level.
